participant_abstract.sent: Project manager went through the agenda.
This was followed by ideas from the industrial design perspective, which concluded with a brief discussion.
Next, the marketing perspective was presented, again with comments and questions following.
Finally, the interface design perspective was presented.
Each presentation highlighted some desired functionalities.

participant_actions.sent: Each participant will start to do preliminary design

participant_problems.sent: Some potential problems with using speech recognition in the remote control were discussed
